name: Violeta
title: All perfect
description: The cleaning is 10/10. The location is also good to disconnect for a few days. We have been there during a cold time and it was a bit cold in the room although I have to say that there were heating in the rooms and they worked perfectly.

name: Maider
title: Wonderful
description: Wonderful place to relax, with total disconnection. Mountain views are amazing and no noise. The very cozy house and the perfect treatment received. The pool and barbecue are a luxury.

name: Mar
title: Excellent stay between friends
description: The incredible pool, good location to bring together several friends or friends, the great owner! We were very comfortable.

name: Vicky
title: Recommended 100%
description: I liked everything in general, a very nice and cozy house, the pool one last. A good place to spend a few quiet days. We will repeat for sure.
